thread.title: Judge hands Redstone family victory in CBS dispute

title: Judge hands Redstone family victory in CBS dispute
text:
Judge hands Redstone family victory in CBS dispute 7:16pm BST - 01:38
A judge declined on Thursday to issue a restraining order against Shari Redstone, allowing her to exert control over CBS Corp (CBS.N) and dealing a setback to the U.S. media company’s plans to strip her voting power and thwart a merger with Viacom. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A judge declined on Thursday to issue a restraining order against Shari Redstone, allowing her to exert control over CBS Corp (CBS.N) and dealing a setback to the U.S. media company’s plans to strip her voting power and thwart a merger with Viacom.
